remark.p: Vice President of the American Contracting Corporation, Minneapolis; member, National Commission on the Observance of International Women’s Year; Chairman, Women’s Caucus, Democratic National Committee; U.S. Representative to the Commission on the Status of Women of the United Nations Economic and Social Council; member, U.S. Delegation to the 27th session of the Commission on the Status of Women, 1978; member, U.S. Delegation to the 1980 United Nations World Conference on Women
